meanings.sent1: She often misspells words in her homework.
meanings.sent3: The robot misspells words on purpose to confuse us.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting is so messy that it looks like it misspells every word.
meanings.sent5: The student's habit of misspelling words became a running joke in the class.

meanings.sent1: He writes misspells when he's in a hurry.
meanings.sent2: She types misspells on her computer without realizing it.
meanings.sent3: The comedian intentionally speaks misspells to make people laugh.
meanings.sent4: The wind howled misspells through the trees.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky misspells during the celebration.
